title: Adm. Stavridis: How NATO could still defeat Putin now that Russia has invaded Ukraine
description: Retired Admiral James Stavridis, former NATO supreme allied commander, Europe, talks to Chuck Todd about the tools NATO has to fight back against Russian President Vladimir Putin.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
content:encoded: Retired Admiral James Stavridis, former NATO supreme allied commander, Europe, talks to Chuck Todd about the tools NATO has to fight back against Russian President Vladimir Putin.
